sentences.en: It is impossible to outface a cat, because they do not have to blink.
sentences.cn: 因为猫儿不必眨眼睛, 所以我们不可能瞪视著它.

sentences.en: Was it perhaps dropped by accident as the woman climbed up the 1500 stairs carved outface ?
sentences.cn: 这或许是减少了事故的女子爬上楼梯雕刻蔑视1500年？

sentences.en: Was it perhaps dropped by accident as the woman climbed up the 1500 stairs carved outface?
sentences.cn: 它或许是削减变乱的女子爬上1500刻蔑视楼梯？

words.tran_cn: 蔑视；无畏惧地面对；盯住…使之不安
